column1: 70. According to the 7th Respondent, the following took place:

column2: Based  on  a  decision  taken  by  the  Monetary  Board  on  17th  August  2015
(“7R6”), an on-sight special investigation was conducted on the LDBL by
the  Department  of  Bank  Supervision  during
commencing  from  14th  September  to  18th  September  2015  regarding  the
affairs of the LDBL as at 31st August 2017.
